dcterms:creator: C. E. Alchourrón
P. Gärdenfors
D. Makinson
dcterms:description: The AGM postulates provide a standard framework for rational belief revision, focusing on how an agent changes her beliefs when encountering new information inconsistent with her initial beliefs.
dcterms:title: AGM postulates

dcterms:creator: A. Darwiche
J. Pearl
dcterms:description: The DP postulates extend the AGM framework to iterated belief revision, addressing the limitations of the AGM postulates in handling sequential new information.
dcterms:title: DP postulates

dcterms:creator: H. Katsuno
A. O. Mendelzon
dcterms:description: The KM postulates characterize rational belief update, focusing on how an agent modifies her beliefs about a dynamically-changing environment.
dcterms:title: KM postulates

dcterms:creator: S. Rodrigues
dcterms:description: Rodrigues's approach integrates the DP postulates into belief update scenarios, although it does not meet the basic requirements of iterated belief update.
dcterms:title: Rodrigues's approach

dcterms:creator: T. Meyer
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses basic infobase change, providing insights into the dynamics of belief change.
dcterms:title: Iterated belief revision

dcterms:creator: R. Booth
T. Meyer
dcterms:description: This dataset explores admissible and restrained revision, focusing on the constraints of belief revision operators.
dcterms:title: Iterated belief contraction

dcterms:creator: C. Schwering
G. Lakemeyer
M. Pagnucco
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates belief revision and projection in the epistemic situation calculus, providing a framework for reasoning about actions and beliefs.
dcterms:title: Belief revision and projection in the epistemic situation calculus

dcterms:creator: A. C. Nayak
M. Pagnucco
P. Peppas
dcterms:description: This dataset presents dynamic belief revision operators, contributing to the understanding of how beliefs can be dynamically updated.
dcterms:title: Dynamic Belief Revision Operators

dcterms:creator: S. Chopra
A. Ghose
T. A. Meyer
K. Wong
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses iterated belief change and the recovery axiom, providing insights into the dynamics of belief change.
dcterms:title: Iterated Belief Change and the Recovery Axiom

dcterms:creator: S. O. Hansson
dcterms:description: This dataset explores iterated descriptor revision and the logic of Ramsey test conditionals, contributing to the understanding of belief change.
dcterms:title: Iterated Descriptor Revision and the Logic of Ramsey Test Conditionals
